oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Adding Value and Getting Paid for It
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lechtenberg, Kelly F.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: veterinary practice
veterinary services
non-traditional services
consulting
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This article discusses possible methods to create a competitive advantage for your practice by "Adding Value" to traditional veterinary services and suggests mechanisms by which the practice may receive compensation for these non-traditional services.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1998; 17-21
